triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper addresses multi-agent reinforcement learning as the fundamental problem domain.

triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: Multi-agent reinforcement learning is the core challenge this paper tackles.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a deep learning-based approach for multi-agent coordination.

triples.name: Q-learning
triples.relevance: QMIX is a value-based method that extends Q-learning principles to multi-agent settings.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The mixing network is implemented as a neural network architecture.

triples.name: StarCraft (video game)
triples.relevance: StarCraft is the domain used to create and evaluate the SMAC benchmark.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: Policy-based methods are alternative approaches to value-based methods like QMIX.

triples.name: Decentralised system
triples.relevance: The paper proposes QMIX as a novel approach to enable decentralized policy execution in multi-agent systems.
